# History

## 0.1.0 (2025-11-01)
- Initial MVP release: Windows-only system tray support with icons, tooltips, menus, separators, and click handlers.
- Added CLI for demos.
- Basic tests and documentation.
- Dependencies: pywin32 (Windows), typer (CLI).

Future: v0.2.0 adds notifications and dynamic updates; v1.0.0 for full cross-platform.
